content.detailedDescription: 1 am on may 2nd 2012. my friend asked me to come outside and take a look at something. i walked out side and saw a red light or orb floating in the high northern sky about 1 mile away. we observed it for about ten minutes then two green lights appeared, one on each side of the red one, then shortly after 6 more red lights appeared under the red and green light(s). the red light then got brighter and dropped something about equivilent size to itself rapidly hitting the ground below it. as soon as it happen we grabbed our cameras and ran to the area we believed it hit.. soon after leaving our house the lights disappeared... not just vanishing.. no they were chased like no other! they flew toward the superstition mountains.. it seemed they were being chased because they left in a hurry and 2 minutes later about 4 f16s flew right over us. so after 13 hours of nonstop searching for the landing site.. we came across it at about 12pm may 3rd 2012. whatever it was it melted through the sidewalk and concrete.. its been about a week since then and i still go back everyday to observe it.. its changing the ground drastically. its forming some kind of crystal substance almost as if the crystals are a biological life form. its pretty cool. though i hope its not a bad thing lol.
content.summary: 9 lights/orbs 2 green, 7 red, one red bigger than all other lights/orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was talking on the phone on my patio when i looked up to observe what looked like a large ball of orange light hovering to my north. it began to move to the east at a fast pace until it seemed to disappear behind a cloud. the object never reappeared. it was much to large to be a plane and was so bright it looked like a large ball of fire. i heard no sound until i lost sight of it at which time i heard a loud noise i have never heard before. it almost sounded like godzilla.
content.summary: Orange ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
i am a 4th generation abductee. i have experienced missing time, spider bites, punctures strange blotches on my hands, small wound that healed in six hours on my palm, and scoop marks. a psychic told me the punctures in the pic attached were immunizations. 

i saw 3 greys when i was five years old. i have seen three ships as ships, up very close about a hundred feet from them. i have seen  cars do very odd things which in all probability they were small craft instead of cars. i have seen portals in broad daylight. i have seen kiwi birds in nacogdoches as well as mule deer, none of which are here in this part of texas.

i am often psychic and sometimes i see the future. i know nothing of coming disasters they haven't told me anything like that.

they have saved my life eight times that i know of. one of the incidents was saving me from an exploding cannon. someone got hurt in my place. there is lots more stuff. this is just a brief overview. they come one or more times a month. they have been very active the last two months.

i believe at the moment i have an implant in my sinus or brain. 

sometimes they talk to me. i talk to them often. they have done a few things for me as proof. when i discovered what was going on in 2009 i thought i was crazy, and they helped me through some rough spots. i always thought that guardian angles were doing stuff to me.

i'd like my case investigated further by mufon if possible. i will take lie detector tests, x-rays, anything. i want the truth revealed to and understood by the public. i do not like having a secrete life.

i also had cancer when i was 2.5 years old. i had it for over a year before they found out why i was sick. it was a sarcoma. the doctors didn't have a clue as to why i lived long enough for them to find it. sarcoma is the most invasive cancer there is. most still die from it. i may have been the first to live from it.
content.summary: Abduction experiences

content.detailedDescription: This event happened on january 27, 2011 in essie kentucky. the sky was overcast. i couldn���t see any stars. i was sitting in a chair near my heating stove at 4:00am to punch the fire up and put a little coal on it, and all of a sudden through what used to be a door on the backside of the house, i saw a light that i thought might have been an airplane. i thought, ���that was strange looking���. i went to my living room window to look up and see if the object was flying overhead but i couldn���t see it anywhere, which i thought was strange because by then it should���ve been right outside my window where i could see it. i decided to go outside to film it. i keep my camera in my pocket all the time. when i got outside, i couldn���t see it, and the reason i couldn���t see it was because it was straight up over my head about 1,500ft in the air or possibly further. it almost looked like a tiny ant from where i was standing. i could tell that the top of it was spinning around and the bottom was too. the top dome was spinning to the right and the bottom dome was spinning to the left. the entire craft was glowing except for the inner part, which was dark.  you could see little lights rotating around from the middle of the craft. there were also lights flickering from the bottom of the craft. if the craft would���ve been 100ft in the air from me, i believe it would���ve at least been 75 to 100ft in length and about 40ft in width. it was a huge craft. it wasn���t stationary but most of the movement on the video was caused by me trying to keep it in view. the craft was somewhat wobbling. the reason there are two videos of it is because i got excited and i was going to take snapshots of it while i was recording but instead i pressed the wrong button and caused it to stop recording. when that happened i had to start recording again. by the time i zoomed in on it again it took off in a split second and disappeared right before my eyes. when it took off, all the lights (pole lights and house lights) in the holler shut off for a second and then turned back on. it turned off my camera, which is why there is no more footage after it left.  the sound you hear at the end of the video i didn���t hear at the time i was filming. the entire event lasted for about 40 seconds. i have included the original videos and an edited version of the videos.
content.summary: Reddish-orange disc shaped craft caught on film

content.detailedDescription:
I have answered this description in the easiest way, by following the numbered questions and answering them directly.

1. i was at home,taking out the trash when i noticed this bright red and greenish colored light illuminating the yard. i had to find out what was going on.

2. i went to see where the light was coming from and it was then that i saw the really bright lights that were just there , in sky , on this object that made no noise. the object seemed to hover and then move in a straight line, then back again. it would decend a little, then go back up. it would continue like this. it looked like an airplane was in the area, and the object seemed to go crazy with its lights. almost as if the lights were flashing and brightening in a pattern. sometimes the the object seemed to almost glow white as if the airplane was causing it to go crazy.

3. i actually thought it was a helicopter, when i went looking for the source of the light.

4. the object itself was circular, oval disk like in shape. it was dark except for the lights. it mostly hovered and made a straight line path.

5. i said, "what the f*ck is that?" and grabbed my phone and began to video. i have about 17- 20 mins. of film. it was the weird and i knew i had to get it on video. i was holding my phone up to video for quite some time that my arm was beginning to ache. after the sighting i knew i had to call my sister, she would know what to do, whom to contact.

6. i lost sight of the object when i came inside because the baby was coughing. by the time i came back out it was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: The object was very bright in the sky. the lights went between a green, grayish-white, and red color.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on the phone.   one flew over and i just thought it must be a plane with strange bright lights, then there were three in a row, way too close for airplanes.
one slowed and the second caught up to it then they all disappeared.
 i was thinking those look like ufo's when my roommate drove up yelling, " did you see them"
she said she saw the lights as red and a dome top

i was mostly trying to deny what i was seeing
content.summary: There was one separate, then 3 in a line evenly spaced, my roommate saw them as well as she was driving home, i just saw the lights, she saw the dome

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home after my son's baseball game, my wife and i noticed these two very bright orange balls of fire in the sky. they appeared to just be hovering for a moment. i pulled over our vehicle to see if i could tell what these tow things were. they were very different then all of the stars in the sky and did not move or have the lighting to make us believe that they were planes. plus they were too close to be planes in formation and i've never seen planes with orange only lights. after a moment, we could see the items moving so we started driving and taking pictures and video of the items when a third orange ball appeared. they changed direction and started moving a bit faster. the third ball that appeared seemed to just disappear then a moment later another disappeared. the one that seemed to be leading the pack took the longest to disappear. it kinda just stopped moving then just disappeared as if someone just switched off the light.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Started as two items then a third appeared before they changed direction and disappeared one at a time

content.detailedDescription: Just i���m adding a photo taken by a friend this morning. he passed me this photo via facebook,and he said that he took the photo today in the morning with his cellphone, showing an object passing thru right to left in front of his window���s flat.
content.summary: A friend caught an ufo with his cellphone over my city

content.detailedDescription:
Two events occurring on night of may 9, 2012:

1) at 9:55 pm edt; driving north on m-65 between twinning and whitamore, noticed pressure changed in cab of truck, felt the engine noise was louder than normal and was looking at computer display when noticed lights in the sky around nnw (11:00 to due north on road). three equally spaced white lights that seemed like big stars, oriented in a horizontal line just above treeline. then a orange ball, 2-3 times the size of the white lights, appeared equally spaced to the left of the three white lights. the orange ball was darker at its center and brighter at the edges and was roughly the size of 1/2 my pinky finger nail held out in front of me. all of these lights glowed continuously without flickering and without moving. then the white lights started to turn off, in sequence of left, right, then middle, leaving only the orange light on for a small amount of time before it too went out. no fading of lights, all just turned off like switches had been tripped. at this point, the pressure / sound difference in the cab of the truck stopped abruptly. overall, i estimate the experience to last 5-10 seconds total. 

my travels continued after the first sighting with me going north on m-65, through whitemore, until m-55 without noticing anything else. i turned east on m-55 and continued until sand lake road, noticing that 3-4 cars of people were stopped at different points of m-55 along the sides of the road (going either direction). this leads to the second sighting:

2) at 10:25 pm edt: turned north onto sand lake road and immediately noticed a single orange ball above the tree line at nne (about 1:00 oclock from due north on the road). this was identical in type to the orange ball from earlier, but about 1/2 the size. roughly 2 seconds into seeing the ball it simply turned off, at which time i looked straight down sand lake road and saw two orange balls of the same style appearing to be over sand lake itself. i believe there was actually 4-5 lights, as a 'leap-frog' sequence of turning on and off started going horizontally across the sky (with numbers indicating position of lights going left to right). when i first saw them, lights 1 and 2 were on for about 2 seconds, after which light 1 went off and 3 went on; then two went off and 4 went on; then 3 went off and 5 went on; then both lights 4 and 5 remaining lit simply turned off in unison. this whole sequence of on and off lasted roughly 5-7 seconds, with each newly lit light remaining on for only about 1 second. 

after the second sighting i was able to make it to my cottage (around another 5 minutes of drive time) for the evening and am now creeped out and not wanting to go outside again. i told my daughter of both incidents just after each of them happened and she encouraged me to report this as she reported extremely similar lights and behavior in 2008 outside of west lafayette in where she went to grad school.
content.summary: Blinking star-like lights and orange balls in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Almost exactly one half hour after another sighting.
i was not the first to see this event. i was sitting inside and my mother called out the family. she was smokeing and she sees 4 lights that are all flashing at the same time and that are about 10 degrees apart. these all moved at the same rate (about 10 degrees per second with one flash every second) we followed the lights from north west to south west. they suddenly stoped over the tree line and then stayed in place for a good minute. they then suddenly dropped out of sight behind tree line. 
about ten seconds after we got outside (15 seconds elapsed time from first sight to four members outside) we heard the roaring start. the roar continued for about 10 seconds after the objects sppeared. aproximit elapsed time 3 minutes. 
all members saw same thing.
content.summary: Dot like

content.detailedDescription:
We were driveing east down m-65. we saw a flash of light, followed by another flash and another. then a fourth flash appeared as the first flash disapeared. the last flash consisted of at least 4 lights. the flashes appeared withing a ten degree length of sky and flashed form the north towards the south. we pulled over to the closed gas station (no lights) to look at the sky as soon as we saw this. we saw no more lights but we did hear a roaring sound. 

we saw no more lights after this but the roar lasted a good minute or two then faded rapidly.

(side note) out of the corner of my eye i saw a light appear and then dispear to the south very small and dull, probablly no importance. miles away another family member heard explosions that woke her dog at the exact same time.
content.summary: A line of lights

content.summary: A line of lights

content.detailedDescription: It was shortly after 11pm and we noticed a light out the kitchen window.  we thought at first it was a star or a plane, but then quickly realized it was too big to be a star or a plane.  it was very bright and caught our attention.  the object continued in the north western sky hovering at times as it stayed in the sky and in our view for about 20 minutes.  we noticed when it was hovering that the object was changing colors.  then it seemed to take off again in the flight path and quickly disappeared from our view off into the distance.  it didnt have the flight path of a plane as when it was hovering it was very slow and then just took off much faster than a plane would be able to.
content.summary: Ufo in north western sky

content.detailedDescription: I'm a firm ufo beliver and attend the local ipswich ufo sociey meetings on a regular basis, for the last few months i've been setting up my video camera near a window on a tripod and letting it run unattended for about 1 hour 15 minites, i wasn't having much luck during the daytime so i switched to nighttime and on the night of the 7th of april 2012 i got lucky and this is the image i captured, the video was taken from my address in the heart of ipswich, which is 22 miles west of brisbane, i had the camera pointed north northeast and angled up to about 40 degrees above the horizon, the video camera i used was a jvc gz-hd520ag high definition, later when i stopped the camera and hooked it up to my recorder as i always do and as i viewed the part where the objects appeared i had at first thought it was a meteorite breaking-up but when i went back and checked later i was certainly surprised to find that they were in fact objects, two of the objects displayed flashes which i think are propulsion bursts as they passed over, i was hoping by sending you this short video clip that you would do an analysis and let me know what you find.
content.summary: Unidentified objects  cylinder shape passes over ipswich queensland australia.

content.detailedDescription:
This is my second experience of seeing these cloud like objects over our neighborhood within two weeks and relates to the sighting in case # 37779.

i was sitting with a group of 4 friends sunday night may 6th in east dallas.  it was a relatively windless evening with lighter colored clouds gathered to the north. 

i was partially reclined and looking up at the clouds when i noticed a small dark isolated cloud coming from the sw heading ne.  i pointed it out to my friends who immediately noticed it.  

the 'cloud' appeared  about the size of a cessna and quite dense. from the angle that i was sitting it looked like a cigar shape (perhaps i was seeing the side of it) as the 4 other witnesses described seeing a triangular, or boomerang shape.

there was very little movement in the cloud cover backdrop as we watched the small dark cloud 'flying' as fast if not faster than an airplane.  the cloud's movement  (parallel in relation to the horizon) visually stood out.   

the experience was kind of unnerving.  i have no idea what this thing was  but i felt like whatever it was was trying to obscure itself. one of my more skeptical friends said it was the strangest thing he ever saw.
content.summary: Cloudlike ufo over dallas second sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was camping with friends in penticton in a camp site within city limits. i was sitting on a picnic table having a conversation with my girlfriend. i looked up at the stars and saw what i thought was a flashing satellite. as i stared t it it disappeared. i stood up and began searching for it, inadvertently annoying my girlfriend for ignoring her statement. as i searched i found another flashing object on the other side of the sky. unsure if this was the same object i observed it's behaviour. it was flashing in a random pattern with random colours as far as i could distinguish.Over the course of 3-4 minutes it did this several times, flashing, disappearing and reappearing covering vast distances in a split second. at this point i began to shakes my friends tents saying " get up! you gotta see this! i managed tor rouse 5 of my friends from their tents. by this time a second object had joined in. they would pair up on opposite sides of the sky directly above us flashing almost in synchronization. they would carry on the same routine; flashing, disappearing and reappearing. eg. if my field of view was a box with side a on the left, side b on the right, side c on the top and side d on the bottom; object a would start at a and object 2 at b. flashing for a few seconds then disappearing to reappear with possibly object 1 at side c and object 2 at side d. this went on for approximately 5 minutes. then the pattern changed. they would sway back and forth across the sky, like they were playing chicken or something. again after a few minutes the pattern changed  to swirling around each other, gradually getting larder and smaller diameters. then at the end of a large diameter swirl they raced towards each other stopped simultaneously and shot of in a east and west direction away from each other in opposite directions. the rush of energy i felt after that was exhilarating. i had never felt so alive. good luck getting sleep after that. so we sat around for a few hours after that talking about what we had seen, bugged the people who missed it, and swapped stories of other people we knew who had encounters to one extent or the other. i feel very lucky to have witnessed it and hope to see others, though i had seen a type of pink wormhole or an orb of some sort in 2007 but have never found anything close to the description of what i saw. for several years after this incident i was obsessed with tracking ufo sightings but as time carried on i graduated and got focused on my career so until now i haven't been involved. that is until i discovered the tr-3b flying triangle which was reversed engineered by usaf from roswell. it uses a magnetic disruptor field to lower the mass of the craft by 88%! check it out guys the future is now and we are not alone in the universe! thank you so much for allowing me to finaly report this and thank you for your time.
content.summary: Started w/ 1 flashing object then another joined in.

content.detailedDescription: Camping last night,could not sleep,set up in the tent and lite a smoke and its pitch black out 1am,saw a flash of light about 10 feet in front of tent in corner of eye,turned to look at what it was and saw another ball of light come out of the ground,that was two of them,shined my flash light at the spot and another orb came out of the ground and fly straight up.Freaked me out but didnt scare me.
content.summary: Orbs out of the ground

content.detailedDescription: We spotted this ufo over the civic center in salisbury. it just appeared in the sky out of nowhere it moved forward for about 4 seconds and then vanished. it had three lights on it on at each point and two larger ones on the bottom.
content.summary: Triangle that appeared moved forward and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from the store when i noticed two triangular objects flying over a wooded area about 5 blocks from my house. objects were changing color. it did not appear that they had lights on them but they appeared to be made of light. one was prominently green, the other was prominently blue. they had two orbs trailing them, although the orbs did not seem to be touching the object they followed it and they changed color as the object changed color and they changed the same color as the object (as if they were connected to it) there was also a red orb in the front of the object but the red orb did not remain lit the entire time. at first i thought someone was flying "kites with lights" i say that because they were moving like kites move when someone is doing tricks (dipping and ascending rapidly then hovering) i ruled out the kite theory immediately as they were flying over a wooded area (and what idiot would fly a kite in the woods) i also thought of a hang glider but there is no take off point for hang gliders where i live. anyway i saw another car sitting at a stop sign adjacent to the one i was sitting at i approached the car and asked the occupant if they saw what i was seeing (to make sure i wasn't loosing it!) she said yes. so now realizing i wasn't halucinating, i rushed home to get my camera. by the time i got back to the spot were i saw the objects it was only one left (the blue one) on the video you can hear the crickets, you can hear my voice, you can hear the cars passing by. but you cannot hear any noise coming from the object. i was very nervous, my hands were shaking, my heart was racing plus i was on full zoom, so the footage is a bit shaky. i was trying to zoom in so one could see the shape of the object and zoom back out so one could see the way it was moving. it was making sharp turns that i've never seen any plane or helicoptor make (as i said it was like a kite) it would get small and then big very quickly as it moved far away and then near again. one of the times when i tried to zoom in (which would've been a perfect shot) the object became blury but you can see that it is changing color. if you pause the video at different parts you can make out a definite shape. anyway i lost sight of it when it went behind the tree line and i never saw it again. notice at the end of the video right before it goes behind the tree line it is heading in one direction and then quickly changes direction.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular shaped looked like "kites with lights" glowing pulsating changing colors no sound

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 10p.M. i was coming home from the market. i looked to the north and saw this pulsating light, it was to large and close to be a star, and too large to be just a regular light, and it was in an area of the sky that i have never seen a light in. i knew it was not a normal size anything.  it was not a plane, nor a helicopter. it hovered in silence just over the tree tops and it was way to big and too high to be a street light. it pulsated large and small lights of different colors, red and greenish blue? it held in place for i believe 45 min then just disappeared. my husband had never seen  a planet in that area either. per him he had never seen a star in that area  before. he was surprised when the star went home for the night, or turned itself off. we got out the binoculars and watched the object grow larger, then shrink as it was pulsating. i stood out in front of my home and watched it. i watched it for about 45min, then i went into my home 15 to 20 min  i looked out my bedroom window it was gone.
i was not afraid nor surprised i have heard helicopters fly over our home always after 10 or 11 pm. i believe they are military helicopters because there are no other helicopters that fly around here day or night. we are a very small town. i have been here 8 years and never seen a object like this before in the northern sky.
content.summary: Hovered above tree tops, called cops no other reports of sighting.

content.detailedDescription: First off, a few months ago i witnessed something at this address and reported it on this site in january, since then me and my girlfriend have on multiple occasions witnessed both white orbs and orange but only for a few seconds so i didnt report it because there was not enough time to assess the situation in full also on many nights i have witnessed a large starlike orb that blinks rapidly but never witnessed it move just always noticed after it was stationary again i have nicknamed this orb mr.Blinkie which lets you know how often we see it. this morning was different tho, after just waking up me and my girlfriend were getting our first smoke in for the day and i noticed mr. blinkie was in its usual spot but it usually is there around ten at night not five in the morning. well it was hovering appearing not to move but i kept seeing it zigzag in place and i mentioned it to my girlfriend. well right after that at my four o'clock we witnessed what was until this point we thought a star but it was an orb and it went from one orb and split into two, one white orb headed north slow on a pretty straight path but the other orange orb moved south at a very very fast pace but it moved at constant angles and also it reminded me how a tad pole swims by the way it kind of skipped. well after the split ways a small blue orb seemed to appear from nowhere between the two. this was an amazing site and was just the start of the show. withing about twenty seconds or less after seeing these three orbs moving with the blue following the orange we witnessed flying orbs in all directions as if an entire fleet was above us, easily fifteen to twenty just hard to tell because they were everywhere. all the white orbs seemed to hover and move slightly with a binary orb that moved in mimic of the the white to i guess help conceal them and remain looking like stars yet we watched three or four sets of these move all over the place. also lots of orange orbs flying and the first one went from moving all over the going stationary with a plane showing over the horizon, but when it stopped to its right another orange appeared with a blue orb on its tail. the white orbs were much larger and moved slow but the orange orbs were quite fast and all had that tad pole movement and all the orange orbs had a very small blue or in tow. this went on for about an hour and a half and never a dull moment. even when the sky went from dark to that early morning blue they were still at it. also mr.Blinkie was hovering/stationary as usual but blinking at a rapid rate and then for the first time i witnessed it move west while elevating and eventually disappearing in the clouds. it was the most amazing thing i have ever witnessed. i feel very honored to experience all the small less than a minute sightings since my first in january but last night was like getting booth tickets at the super bowl and open bar. we tried to take photos and video but both our phones haver terrible cameras and got nothing but black. without a doubt these were not human nor controlled drones or anything like that. i leave for boot camp in thirty days but would like the chance to capture this because mr. blinkie is a frequent visitor along with a giant white orb that stays close to blinkie but also seems to move without being seen just after the fact. also some seemed to have a light trail almost like the grand theft auto effect. but as they were starting to leave all the orange orbs seemed to suck up the blue orbs and like wise the white orbs with their shadow orb until they all just seemed to vanish. this was so incredible and surely we couldnt be the only ones to catch it unless no one was outside that early or looking up. but i still dont know what kind of interest they would have in this area but they are showing up more and more frequently. if anyone else saw this please report it because i would hate for no one else to witness such poetry.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple orbs of different sizes white largest then orange and small blue orbs, also one large star like orb that blinked blue green and red and was stationary until end of event and elevated

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i stayed at whistler, bc for a week. we were out on the deck looking at the night stars when we saw what seems to be a green beam blinking in the sky. it was sometimes faint and sometimes more visible. it appeared transparent, but whenever a cloud passed by, we see it blinking. after looking at it for 10 or so minutes, we noticed a grey stroke right above the ursa major. the stroke looked like it aligned with the green beam, although they were not attached and were a distance from each other. after looking at it for about 30-40 minutes, we saw 2 more green beams blinking - one above and one far below. again, they were only visible when clouds passed by. they were all aligned together, and if you connect the beams together, it would form a straight line. after about an hour, they all disappeared, including the grey stroke.
content.summary: 3 green beams of light blinking over clouds

content.detailedDescription: Yellow orange ufo on spid
content.summary: Yellow orange ufo

content.detailedDescription: On 5/8/12 at 8:55pm (dusk) i drove to my usual locaton to see if the lights were going to be there tonight. i only observed one diamond flasher i call it, took a few photos which i will forward to you shortly. i feel confident that you will agree, that what i am capturing is extremely interesting. i have been to this location several times and have photos to share also i have 2 other witnesses that were with me on seperate nights.We have been seeing these objects almost nigtly. on 5/4 we saw are usual flashing diamond and then saw several white objects to the right of it and lower moving almost in zigzag motions then a plane approached and it went black. my witness that night is a retired judge and he will gladly share his experience. i will forward the photos to you let me know your thoughts. if there is a logical explanation to what i'm capturing please let me know,but for now,i don't think so!!
content.summary: Ufo's over watkinsville georgia

content.detailedDescription:
San francisco - apx. 7pm 5/8/12. 

on the corner of presidio and pine i noticed the sky. it was a rare and beautifully temperate day, a rarity as sf is frequently enshrouded in clouds and i felt i had to take note of what seemed like endless blue above me. i noticed something flying in a straight line high in the air hundreds of feet away. "a bird", i thought. it had to be a bird, it was too small to be a plane. i called upon my common sense and admittedly small pool of zoological knowledge and thought again. "why would it be flying alone so high up? it can't possibly be hunting, it's too high. it can't be hurt, it's too high." it didn't make sense. at this point i literally giggled out loud to myself and thought of the gullible suckers who would have immediately leapt to identifying this thing as a ufo. mid-chuckle i became a sucker myself. 

it changed course suddenly. not violently, not totally drastically either, but it started taking turns faster than any flying object i've ever seen. it sounds crazy, but as fast as it was going it's movement was still graceful - like a leaf falling sideways. i am confident in saying that if this was indeed a tangible object it completely defied the human grasp of aeronautic physics. my smile faded and i stood transfixed. the light dimmed and grew stronger. a pin-prick of orange swelled into a glowing orb and then back down again. it seemed to calm it's turning a bit and stayed bobbing at a relatively fixed point in the sky; it's size still inhaling and exhaling light. with my head cocked like a dog that's heard a noise it doesn't understand, i was jolted back into reality by the shrill honk of a car. i looked down. a friend of mine who happened to be driving by waved and gestured for me to get in - "i'll give you a ride" she mouthed. i looked back up at the sky and there again was the endless blue - the orb had vanished.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A small orb of orange light flying straight at first and then started erratically changing direction. it then appeared to hover briefly and disappeared.
